Description:
Imagine being in the middle of fixing a global security crisis, only to find out your own son's Minecraft game is broken... by your code. In this powerful clip, Log4j maintainer Christian Grobmeier shares the unforgettable moment the Log4Shell vulnerability hit home.

#Log4j #Log4Shell #Minecraft

Author: GitHub
Title: How this open source project broke Minecraft
